io.micronaut.core.beans

Interface BeanInfo<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type Generic
    Deprecated. 
    Use BeanIntrospection instead

    @Deprecated
public interface BeanInfo<T>
    An interface that provides basic bean information. Designed as a simpler replacement for java.beans.BeanInfo.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Method Summary

      • getPropertyDescriptors

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PropertyDescriptor> getPropertyDescriptors()
        Deprecated. 
        The properties of the bean.
        Returns:
        The properties of the bean as a map where the key is the property name
